gear_recs.name: Hydration pack
gear_recs.description: This is gonna be a long hike. Consider bringing a hydration pack!

gear_recs.name: Hiking poles
gear_recs.description: Due to the increase in elevation, hiking poles can help stabilize you on your hike!

gear_recs.name: Sunscreen
gear_recs.description: You always need sunscreen with you, even if it's not sunny! Remember to reapply every 45 minutes.

gear_recs.name: Sunglasses
gear_recs.description: It's gonna be a sunny day so protect your eyes with sunglasses!

clothing_recs.name: Windbreaker jacket
clothing_recs.description: Be prepared and bring a windbreaker jacket!

clothing_recs.name: Beanie
clothing_recs.description: Keep your head and ears warm with a beanie!

clothing_recs.name: Hat
clothing_recs.description: Keep cool and out of the sun with a hat!

clothing_recs.name: Snow shoes
clothing_recs.description: Snow shoes will keep your feet warm and dry during your snowy hike!

clothing_recs.name: Hiking shoes
clothing_recs.description: Hiking shoes are great for long hikes. They keep your feet dry and have a good grip on uneven terrains.

clothing_recs.name: Rain jacket
clothing_recs.description: There's a chance it's going to rain during your hike. Be prepared and bring a rain jacket!
